Crafting Tweaks.name: Flint to Gravel
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for Gravel to be crafted from Flint.

inspirationvt

attscript

Crafting Tweaks.name: Sand to Red Sand
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for Red Sand to be crafted from Sand and Orange Dye.

inspirationvt

attscript

Crafting Tweaks.name: Smeltable Concrete Powder
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for Concrete Powder to be smelted into Stained Glass.

inspirationvt

attscript

Crafting Tweaks.name: Dirt to Grass
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for Grass to be crafted from Dirt and Wheat Seeds, aswell as Podzol to be crafted from Coarse Dirt and Wheat Seeds.

attscript

Crafting Tweaks.name: Dropper to Dispenser
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for Dispensers to be crafted from Droppers, Sticks and Strings. This allows for the convenience of bulk crafting Dispensers, as you don't need bows anymore.

inspirationvt

attscript

Crafting Tweaks.name: Dye to Flowers
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for Flowers to be replicated by crafting them from their respective Dye, Bone Meal and Seeds.

attscript

Crafting Tweaks.name: Mushroom Blocks to Mushrooms
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for Mushrooms to be crafted from Mushroom Blocks, should you somehow get your hands on them.

attscript

Crafting Tweaks.name: Packable Ice
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for Ice to be packed and unpacked into Packed Ice and Blue Ice. Also includes a crafting recipe for Ice, made from Water and Snowballs.

inspirationvt

attscript

Crafting Tweaks.name: Wool to String
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for String to be crafted from all colors of Wool.

attscript

Crafting Tweaks.name: Rotten Flesh to Slime Ball
Crafting Tweaks.description:
Allows for Rotten Flesh to be smelted into Leather and Leather to be smelted into Slime Balls.

attscript
